lead_paragraph: As the year drew to a close, linguistic authorities from around the globe were busy selecting the words that defined 2009, and the decade.
snippet: As the year drew to a close, linguistic authorities from around the globe were busy selecting the words that defined 2009, and the decade. Notable candidates - from "Admonish" to "Vampire Squid" are collected below.
abstract: As the year drew to a close, linguistic authorities from around the globe were busy selecting the words that defined 2009, and the decade. Notable candidates - from "Admonish" to "Vampire Squid" are collected below.
